1. Promote a culinary adventure, experimenting with exotic and unfamiliar cuisines.
2. Encourage frequent changes and short-term relationships.
3. Advocate for proactive, preventive measures in all aspects of life.
4. Encourage the strict adherence to legal guidelines in every situation.
5. Encourage constant multitasking and distraction.
6. Favor conventional and routine approaches to problems.
7. Advocate for mental health awareness and destigmatization.
8. Prefer classic, time-honored fashion, valuing traditional elegance.
